00021 void GroupManager::onAdd() {
00022 
00023 
00024         // ask user to select a value or create own
00025         QString item = ComboSelector::selectGroupType(this);
00026 
00027         // if user wrote an empty string or if clicked cancel
00028         if (item.isEmpty()) {
00029                 return;
00030         }
00031 
00032         model_.appendItem(item);
00033 
00034         // inform that content of the widget has changed
00035         emit contentChanged();
00036         return;
00037 }
00038 
00039 void GroupManager::onEdit() {
00040 
00041         // ask the view for the selected index
00042         QModelIndex index = view_.currentIndex();
00043 
00044         // if index was invalid (nothing was chosen)
00045         if (!index.isValid()) {
00046                 return;
00047         }
00048 
00049         // get the old text that is currently stored in the model
00050         QString oldText = model_.data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00051 
00052         // ask the user to set the new text
00053         QString newText = ComboSelector::selectGroupType(this, oldText);
00054 
00055         // if empty string was given or cancel was pressed
00056         if (newText.isEmpty()) {
00057                 return;
00058         }
00059 
00060         // if user changed the text
00061         else if (oldText != newText) {
00062                 model_.replace(index, newText);
00063 
00064                 // inform that content of the widget has changed
00065                 emit contentChanged();
00066         }
00067 }
